items.reviewContent:
The product has been delivered on time. The packing was seemingly good. But when I opened the product there was a dent measuring 12x 10 inches on the front side of the body. This was a heartbreaking for me for a brand new expensive product. Maybe the dent was caused by transportation or something . I don’t know how Daraz or the seller can compensate me for this. As far as functionality is concerned the product is functioning well. One more thing worth mentioning is that a water pipe connecter is missing from the package, which goes into the water hose and then tightened by 4 screws. The small angled pipe connector. Will that part be sent to me as well apart from dent compensation? 
I was contacted by Dawlance team. They offered me to return the product, but I preferred to keep it to avoid the hassle and wastage of time by returning and then waiting for either refund or replacement product. They sent me the missing part though. Thanks Dawlance.
